contexts.context: ...of a large red house made with pencil and <mark>watercolor</mark>. —#zmurphy
...is drawn in pencil and what appears to be <mark>watercolor</mark>, with the woman's hair obscuring the year number...
...of fruits and vegetables is drawn using pencil and <mark>watercolor</mark>. The pencil is faded, but surprisingly legible...
...the right. They are made with pencil and <mark>watercolor</mark>, and the text is about them.—#rgerzevske
